sentence.Network_en: The most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.
sentence.Network_cn: 最激烈的无政府主义者,居然成了最露骨的变节者.

sentence.Network_en: For barefaced lying you are really it.
sentence.Network_cn: 以无耻造谣而论,你真算得上天下第一.

entry.tran: 厚颜无耻的；公然的；露骨的
entry.def: You use bare-faced to describe someone's behaviour when you want to emphasize that they do not care that they are behaving wrongly.

example.tran: 满嘴无耻谎言的奸诈政客

sentences.sentence: "the most bodacious display of tourism this side of Anaheim"- Los Angeles Times
"the modern world with its quick material successes and insolent belief in the boundless possibilities of progress"- Bertrand Russell

auth_sentence.content: She was accused of telling "barefaced lies" to conceal her attempts to bring down the Cabinet Minister.
